 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹ֫מַח‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==spear, lance== (etymology unknown; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רוּמְחָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — often +<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶרֶב‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִנָּה‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָגֵן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶשֶׁת‎</span>, etc.; — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Judg.5.8|Judg 5:8]]; [[Num.25.7|Num 25:7]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Ezek.39.9|Ezek 39:9]]; [[1Chr.12.9|1Chr 12:9]]; [[1Chr.12.25|1Chr 12:25]] ([[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] v.[[1Chr.12.8|1Chr 12:8]] v.[[1Chr.12.24|1Chr 12:24]]), [[2Chr.14.7|2Chr 14:7]]; [[2Chr.25.5|2Chr 25:5]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְמָחִים‎</span> [[1Kgs.18.28|1Kgs 18:28]]; [[Jer.46.4|Jer 46:4]]; [[Joel.4.10|Joel 4:10]]; [[Neh.4.10|Neh 4:10]]; [[Neh.4.15|Neh 4:15]]; [[2Chr.11.12|2Chr 11:12]]; [[2Chr.26.14|2Chr 26:14]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָמְחֵיהֶם‎</span> [[Neh.4.7|Neh 4:7]].
